description: Agent User is a kv store where the key is an Authorization token, where the value contains app-specific info of that user.

keys.description:
Every key is an 'appId' that is needed by (one of the) tools. 

Every value is an object containing the authorization details.

additionalProperties.$comment: NB: Potentially going to be more comprehensive in the future as there are many authorization methods. We don't want to store openapi specific info inhere, but not sure if some of them require multiple datapoints.
